-- auto-generated definition
create table Faculties
(
    FacultyID   integer
        constraint Faculties_pk
            primary key,
    FacultyName TEXT
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table Grades
(
    GradeID   integer
        constraint Grades_pk
            primary key,
    StudentID integer
        constraint fk_student
            references Students,
    SubjectID integer
        constraint fk_subject
            references Subjects,
    Grade     integer
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table Students
(
    Student_ID integer
        constraint Students_pk
            primary key,
    Name       TEXT,
    Faculty_ID integer
        constraint fk_faculty
            references Faculties
);

-- auto-generated definition
create table Subjects
(
    SubjectID   integer
        constraint Subjects_pk
            primary key,
    SubjectName TEXT
);

INSERT INTO Faculties (FacultyName) VALUES ('Engineering'), ('Business'), ('Science');
INSERT INTO Subjects (SubjectName) VALUES ('Mathematics'), ('Physics'), ('Computer Science');
INSERT INTO Students (Name, Faculty_ID) VALUES
                                                          ('John', 1),
                                                          ('Jane', 2),
                                                          ('Bob', 3);
INSERT INTO Grades (StudentID, SubjectID, Grade) VALUES
                                                     (1, 1, 85),
                                                     (1, 2, 92),
                                                     (2, 1, 78),
                                                     (2, 3, 88),
                                                     (3, 2, 95),
                                                     (3, 3, 90);
